crewBlueprint.desc: Corby, Judge of Technology. Obsessive and constantly malfunctioning, but not unfriendly.

power: Active Ability: Repairs the ship's hull by 3

Ignores mind control, doors, and hazards. Can see adjacent rooms. Does not lose skills.

powerEffect.tooltip:
[COOLDOWN:30s]
